@Destroyer of shitty hentai : If you think the new MC is the victim then we all are "Asahi's" victims. Like I said, if you're ever into grownup relationships then you'll experience some BS like "Eh, but I don't know such things like..." sooner or later haha.

Great art, everything else? Not so much. We get a taste of mei when she was pure, compared to how we see her afterwards...its night and day. Then we see character redemption for the glasses bitch...where she got zero repercussions. Unlucky, too bad we got no further closure with the previous mc.
I hate this, personal salvation for the woman who took advantage of someone then had sex with his brothers right in front of him, and almost nothing about the previous MC

It's weird, this series gets me a bit infuriated with the characters' personalities. Like, they are all garbage human beings, including the previous MC. Only thing holding me off from flipping is the art cuz I really like it.

@4rpon yeah i too think what she done pretty stupid and acted like easygoing girl who  hooked on fine face and big dick, yes she loved that guy, just cause of how he looks, his body  and what he charismatick "cool" boy, and he just played with her and she dont get it, but now i hope she not doing such mistakes and be faithful)

first guy here is for sure just a player, find her broken after being rejected and make her sexually addicted to his dick, i hope second guy with girl from first part will be going well and some dickhead "alpha" dont ruin this
As usual, the real problems in NTR are the women.

The Previous MC was greatly insecure, he was always compared to both his older brother and younger brother. He was the failure, the missing link so it was hard for him to find solace at home. When the events in the previous chapters happened he was shaken and had nobody to turn to. He was alone and isolated. His brothers who should have been there for him were the cause of his problems and he had no friend. 
The new MC doesn't seem to have that kind of background so he could easily say that the previous MC was a Wuss but i d'ont think he could have better had they switched place. It's like raiding a multiplayer boss game alone and without preparation: you are doomed to fail.
Personnaly, i hope the author will write a sequel about the previous MC finding happiness because with the brothers he had he doesn't need enemies.
Damn I feel bad for the new mc, he doesn't really know shit about Asahi
pretty cool extension to the original story
So Mei is already a slut before and asahi got dumped by the student Council president?

@knightsabre2k older brother just moved on with his life, nobody dumped anyone, they were just having fun together. Tho I dunno how her new bf thought she was inexperienced when she literally went full vacuum on his dick.

err... what happened to the older brother Asahi was fucking? I'm pretty sure she got dumped but it's just a little surprising that he was never mentioned & the previous MC was. There's just such a huge disconnect from the ending of the last part and the beginning of the afterstory...

The guy after Asahi it bit realist but I wonder what would happen if find out what really happen he not like the pre Mc who get upset over the girl he like fuck a guy well his case if was random guy he might of handle it but his own brother fuck the girl he like that would make anyone bit unsettling, the bro would have know the Mc like her and still went after them. However it was a whole different situation imo for both MCs. Only favoriting this to remember this shit story. Now gonna go nut to good NTR

Oh... So the reason why Mei is innocently easy because she's, well easy... As for Asahi, yep, what a development, lol. Now she's seeking comfort. I guess the brothers dump possibly both of them. Man, the brothers really did it just to mock the MC, huh? Kinda scary that if you think about it, if we never know what Asahi did, we'll easily pass it as a vanilla series. Also this chapter still mocks the MC for not being able to get laid since it was this easy to do so. The worst part is, her interaction with the new bf washed away her guilt and turned it into "yeah, it's his fault and decision to transfer" jesus christ that's fucking horrible. You would think that at least she will be burdened by guilt but nope, she's fine like nothing ever happened

While it’s true prev MC somewhat forced his thoughts on her, they were in no way in an extremely toxic fashion, while the brothers immediately passed her on to each other without even warming her up to the idea and treated both girls like semi shit

This one is a prequel and a sequel at the same time. Mei is a non-virgin gyaru who had relationships with many boys and Asahi is very cunning as she's probably using the previous MC to get the prez. Why is this series was counted as NTR is beyond me as this shows both girls have NO feelings whatsoever to the previous MC in the first place. And good for Asahi. She gets laid and got rid of a freak who think what's best for her and trying to forced his way on her. Anyway, IMO Asahi is very realistic as most grownup girls nowadays are just like her haha. Sometimes when I read this kinda doujin, I thought, "Hold urself together. Its all just a human fantasy on paper." But my heart always said, "Everything you just saw, came from the deepest part of every human. You didn't even know if this might actually happen already, somewhere. And that person trying so hard to free from this hell circle."

Honestly while I hate this story, I gotta thank it for giving me the idea to write my story “My Neighbor in Black” granted it’s not the same ntr timeline it did help get an idea of what happened after someone is ntr’d. So thank your Benimaru Karu
